Legal Boilerplate

These templates are free and open source. Visit the GITHUB to edit, discuss, and contribute.

Legalease Labs, Inc. is not a law firm, and the contributors to this service are not acting as your attorney. The contents on the LEGALEASE’ website are for the purposes of providing general information only. They are not intended to be legal or other professional advice, or seek to be an exhaustive statement of the law. Generic templates and contracts may fail to meet your needs. Nothing on the LEGALEASE website is to be considered as creating an attorney-client relationship between you and LEGALEASE. You should consult a lawyer to address the particulars of your specific situation. LEGALEASE is not responsible for any loss which may arise from relying on the contents on our website. LEGALEASE does not have any fee-sharing arrangements with any lawyers.
